scoringPlays.text: Darrin Hall 14 Yd Run (Alex Kessman Kick)
Jester Weah 19 Yd pass from Ben Dinucci (Alex Kessman Kick)
Quadree Henderson 75 Yd Punt Return (Alex Kessman Kick)
Hasise Dubois 19 Yd pass from Kurt Benkert (A.J. Mejia Kick)
Qadree Ollison 25 Yd Run (Alex Kessman Kick)
Richard Burney 2 Yd pass from Kurt Benkert (A.J. Mejia Kick)

videos.description: Saleem Brightwell interception and 16-yard return sets up Pittsburgh in  Virginia territory.
videos.headline: A big turnover for Pittsburgh early

videos.description: Darrin Hall puts Pittsburgh on the board with a 14-yard touchdown run.
videos.headline: Pittsburgh in front early

videos.description: Jordan Ellis stop for no gain by Rashad Weaver of Pittsburgh to stop the Virginia drive.
videos.headline: Pittsburgh defense holds on 4th down

videos.description: Ben Dinucci connects to Maurice FFrench for a 32-yard pass play.
videos.headline: FFrench with a tight rope back shoulder catch

videos.description: Kurt Benkert hits Olamide Zaccheaus on a sweep for a 33-yard gain for Virginia.
videos.headline: Zaccheaus provides a spark for Virginia

videos.description: Kurt Benkurt finds Hasise Dubois for a touchdown from 19 yards out for the first Virginia score of the game.
videos.headline: Virginia on the board before half

videos.description: Doni Dowling's 41-yard reception sets up the Virginia deep into Pittsburgh territory.
videos.headline: Dowling with a big time play for Virginia

videos.description: Ben Dinucci finds Jester Weah for a 19-yard touchdown to pad the lead for Pittsburgh.
videos.headline: Dinucci to Weah for a Pittsburgh TD

videos.description: Qadree Ollison's 25-yard touchdown run adds to the Pittsburgh lead in the third quarter.
videos.headline: Ollison gallops for another Pittsburgh TD

videos.description: Quin Blanding's interception for Virginia places the Cavaliers in Pittsburgh territory.
videos.headline: Blanding with a big play for Virginia

videos.description: Kurt Benkert connects to Richard Burney for a 2-yard touchdown pass on 4th and Goal to make it a two score game in the 4th quarter.
videos.headline: Benkert to Burney connect for TD on 4th and Goal

videos.description: Jordan Ellis runs for no gain at the Pittsburgh goal line, the Cavaliers come up empty.
videos.headline: Pittsburgh stymie Virginia at the goal line
